string.name: changelog_400_dev12
string.font:
- Added Video Surface support. 
 - Added support compact layout in support Console, new rich animations. 
 - Major app redesign with improved performance and structure. 
 - Updated app architecture and cleaned up legacy components. 
 - Enhanced stability with improved telemetry integration. 
 - Refined resource handling and UI text for a more consistent experience. 
 - Implemented various actions for the Videos Screen to improve user interactivity and functionality. 
 - Updated Codex to support a 16KB page size, ensuring compatibility with newer Android versions while enhancing overall performance and stability. 
 - Added support for Properties dialog. 
 - Fixed UI issue with Slider, it now animates correctly. 

 - Enjoy, and happy testing!

string.name: changelog_400_dev13
string.font:
- Fixed an issue where scrubbing could cause an ANR crash. 
- Fixed an issue where the slider would jump unexpectedly during seek. 
- Added support for displaying a comprehensive changelog, allowing users to track updates and new features.

string.name: changelog_400_dev14
string.font:
- Implemented an auto-hide controller for a more immersive video playback experience. 
- Introduced a toggle for rotation lock, giving users more control over screen orientation. 
- Addressed several minor bugs across various modules to enhance stability and performance. 
- Improved overall application responsiveness and fixed miscellaneous UI glitches.

string.name: changelog_400_dev15
string.font:
- Added Like/Unlike button in Media Notification 
- Added a Lock controller for the player controller when playing videos, preventing accidental interactions. 
- Fixed issue with Next/Prev button not updating after detecting their availability.

string.name: changelog_400_dev16
string.font: \n- Implemented an Acrylic effect for the Console background, creating an immersive ambient lighting experience. \n- Resolved an issue with state updates that occasionally caused them to fail, ensuring more reliable UI responsiveness.

string.name: changelog_400_dev17
string.font:
- Adjusted parameters of Acrylic background effect for console, enhancing visual depth and clarity. 
- Colorization strategy toggle now switches between default and wallpaper-based themes, offering greater personalization. 
- Fixed an issue where the navigation bar was incorrectly displayed in areas where it should have been hidden. 
- Resolved a problem that caused the Mini-player to appear even when the Console was visible, ensuring a cleaner interface. 
- Introduced a Queue Management UI that intelligently adapts to screen orientation, positioning itself next to the player, similar to the YouTube application.

string.name: changelog_400_dev18
string.font:
- Integrated Sleep Timer functionality with a dedicated user interface and underlying logic. 
- Implemented Playback Speed controls, complete with user interface elements and operational logic. 
- Bug fix - Addressed an issue where removing the current track caused the player to play the first item in the queue instead of the next, improving playback continuity.

string.name: changelog_400_dev19
string.font:
- Added Equalizer; you can now adjust audio frequencies for a personalized listening experience. 
- Implemented Presets for the Equalizer, allowing quick selection of optimized audio settings. 
- Fixed an issue where the Equalizer settings were not consistently applied across sessions. 
- Resolved several minor UI bugs related to the Equalizer interface for a smoother user experience.

string.name: changelog_400_dev20
string.font:
- Enhanced Media Management: Added "Remove" and "Delete" options to the Media player screen. "Remove" takes a track out of the current playlist, while "Delete" removes it from the phone and playlist, potentially moving it to a trash folder if supported. Buttons have been updated for a better look and feel. 
- Smoother Playback Queue: Improved animation for currently playing songs in the queue. 
- Improved New Playlist Creation: The screen for creating new playlists has a refreshed look, adapts to phone orientation, features updated "Update" and "Save" buttons, and has an enhanced playlist description area. 
- Audio Effects Screen Update: The "Save" button on the audio effects screen now has a new design. 
- Clearer Titles: Updated titles on the "New Playlist" and "Audio Effects" screens for better descriptiveness. 
- Settings Fix: Resolved a minor issue with color theme settings to ensure proper functionality. 
- Behind-the-Scenes Improvements: Enhanced the functionality of the equalizer (sound settings).

string.name: changelog_400_dev21
string.font:
- Added MP3 Tag Editor: View/edit metadata (title, artist, album, etc.). Adaptive UI; Pro features for lyrics/artwork. 
- Refined UI in the Queue: the currently playing item's title now animates its font weight. 
- Adjusted the Acrylic effect's luminosity alpha in both light and dark themes for better visual balance. 
- Optimized Image Blur Transformations: Improved bitmap handling for better performance and reduced memory usage. 
- Enhanced LazyList Placeholders: Full-screen Lottie animations for loading/empty states in vertical `LazyList` components. 
- Streamlined "Add to Playlist": 
 - New playlist selection dialog (name, track count, date, artwork). Adapts position to screen size. 
 - "Close" button, tap to select, placeholder for no playlists. 
 - Consistent dialog in Audio/Video sections. Adds tracks, filters duplicates, confirms with toast.

string.name: changelog_400_dev22
string.font:
- Save MP3 Tag Edits: You can now save changes to MP3 tags with a confirmation before overwriting. 
- MP3 Only Edits: The "Edit" option now checks if a file is an MP3, showing a message if it's not. 
- Add to Playlist from Videos & Playlists: Easily add individual videos or tracks from one playlist to another. 
- Improved Tag Handling: Better reading and writing of common ID3 tags. 
- "Liked" Playlist Title: The title for your "Liked" songs playlist is now clearer. 
- "Recent" Playlist Update: Fixed a small issue to make sure recently played items are correctly added to the "Recent" playlist.

string.name: changelog_400_dev23
string.font:
- Refined Console UI: Streamlined dialog management and introduced dedicated state for queue visibility. 
- Improved Sleep Timer Dialog: "Start" button moved to actions slot with updated styling. 
- Widget Overhaul: 
 - Introduced Close button for the widget. 
 - New FAB Video Player: A new floating action button style player for video content. 
 - Expanded Widget (MistyTunes): Added a Like button with a Lottie animation. Skip buttons now use `TonalIconButton` and reflect availability. "Open Console" is now a `TonalIconButton`. Footer controls layout adjusted. 
 - Compact Widget (FabPlayer): Updated to use new request constants. 
- Adjusted widget padding on the Home screen for better layout when the navigation bar is not visible in portrait mode. 
- Dynamic Feature Module Installation: 
 - Implemented infrastructure to install dynamic feature modules (e.g., "Codex") via the Play Store.

string.name: changelog_400_dev24
string.font:
- New Glance-based App Widget: 
 - Displays playback information and controls. 
 - Adapts layout based on size (Compact, Square, Normal). 
 - Compact: Artwork, Chronometer, Title, Play/Pause. 
 - Square: Artwork with overlaid Chronometer, Prev/Play/Pause/Next controls. 
 - Normal: Artwork, Title, Subtitle, Prev/Play/Pause/Next controls, Favourite button. 
 - Launches the main app on click.

string.name: changelog_400_dev25
string.font:
- Better Media Playback: Enjoy smoother playback of files opened from other apps (like your file manager), now showing correct song info and artwork. 
- Smoother App Start: Fixed issues when opening media files if the app wasn't already running. 
- Real Album Art: See the actual album art embedded in your music files, not just generic thumbnails. You can turn this on in settings for a richer look. 
- Player UI Tweaks: Small visual improvements in the player for clearer text and easier control access. 
- Smaller App Size: We've made some internal changes to make the app a bit smaller. 
- Consistent Look: Player elements now have matching rounded corners for a cleaner design. 
- Widget Refinement: The "Like" button animation in the MistyTunes widget has been slightly adjusted for a smoother visual. 
- Improved Background Visuals: If your device doesn't support background blur, the Acrylic background now has a nice "frosted glass" effect, ensuring the app still looks great.

string.name: changelog_400_alpha01
string.font:
- New About Us Screen: App info, changelogs, other apps. 
- Rate & Support: Rate or "Buy me a coffee" via About Us. 
- More Apps: Discover our apps in "More from Us" (About Us). 
- Stay Updated: In-app changelog with release notes. 
- Quick Links: Feedback, GitHub, etc. in About Us top bar. 
- UI Tweaks: Minor layout adjustments. 
- Revamped Settings: Reorganized for easier navigation. 
- Save Changes: New "Save" button in settings for preferences. 
- Unlock Ad-Free: Clear "Unlock Ad-free" option in "Sponsor". 
- New "Upgrades" Section: Unlock premium features from settings. 
- Consistent Styling: Unified preference item appearance. 
- Internal Improvements: More efficient settings management.

string.name: changelog_400_alpha02
string.font:
- Revamped App Configuration: We've improved how app settings are managed for a more stable and efficient experience. 
 - Preferences for Trash Can, Font Scale, Minimum Track Length, System Audio Effects, and Grid Item Size are now centrally managed and reliably saved. 
 - We've optimized the way settings are stored for better performance. 
- Streamlined Settings Screen: 
 - Unsaved changes are now clearly indicated, and you can easily Discard Changes if needed. 
 - Prompts for app restart (if required for settings to take effect) are now clearer. 
 - Navigating back from settings with unsaved changes will now prompt you to save or discard them. 
- New "Acrylic Blur" Preference (Beta): Add a stylish blur effect to backgrounds (experimental). 
- Global Font Scaling: Font size adjustments now apply consistently across the entire application. 
- System Equalizer Integration: 
 - If "Inbuilt Audio FX" is disabled, the Equalizer button in the player console will now attempt to launch your system's audio effects control panel. 
- Faster Startup: Your personalized settings are now loaded instantly when the app launches, ensuring a smooth start every time. 
- Behind-the-Scenes Enhancements: We've made internal improvements for smoother animations and overall app performance.

string.name: changelog_400_alpha03
string.font:
Note: Alpha release. Missing features/bugs expected. 
✓ Improved Audio Effects Control: "In-app Audio Effects" setting is now clearer. Disabling it now correctly uses your phone's built-in equalizer if available. 
✓ Smarter Track Filtering: Tracks shorter than your set "Minimum Track Length" (e.g., ringtones) are now properly filtered out from your music library. 
✓ Refined Settings UI: 
 - The "Min Track Length" slider now goes from 0 to 100 seconds in 10-second steps for easier selection. 
 - "Font Scale" and "Grid Item Size" sliders offer more precise adjustments with more steps. 
 - The "Save" button in Settings is now a Floating Action Button (FAB) for better visibility and appears only when you have pending changes. 
 - The app restart prompt for settings changes now uses a clearer icon and appears *before* settings are applied, so you know what to expect. 
✓ Equalizer Button Logic: The equalizer button in the player console now more reliably launches the system equalizer when in-app effects are off. 
✓ New "Playback" Settings Section: We've added a dedicated section in Settings for all your playback preferences. 
✓ Choose Your Video Renderer (SurfaceView vs. TextureView): 
 - You can now select between `SurfaceView` (default, better performance) and `TextureView` (better for visual effects integration) for video playback. Find this in Settings > Playback > "Video Renderer". 
✓ Customize FAB Player Tap Behavior: 
 - Decide what happens when you tap the Floating Action Button (FAB) player: 
 - Open Console (Default): Tap opens the main player screen. 
 - Expand to Widget: Tap expands the FAB into the in-app widget.

string.name: changelog_400_alpha04
string.font:
Note: Alpha release. Missing features/bugs expected. 
✓ Stream from the Web: You can now play media directly from network URLs! 
 ◦ Access this new feature via a "Link" button on the Library screen. 
 ◦ Paste or type a URL, and we'll start streaming. 
✓ Buffering Indicator: The TimeBar now displays an indeterminate progress indicator when the player is buffering media.

string.name: changelog_400_alpha05
string.font:
Note: Alpha release. Missing features/bugs expected. 
✓ "Organize Files into Sections" Preference: You can now choose to display files in library views (Albums, Audios, etc.) as a flat list or grouped into sections. Find this in Settings > General. 
✓ UI Polish: 
 - The Close Button preference and the new File Grouping preference in Settings now have a background color and distinct tile shapes for better visual organization. 
 - Increased the shadow elevation for the "Newly Added" item card and updated its shape for a more modern look. 
✓ Behind-the-Scenes: 
 - Removed redundant logic in TimeBar for handling negative progress. 
 - Removed accent color from "new update downloaded" snackbar message. 
✓ Remove from "Recents": Long-press an item in the "Recently Played" list on the Library screen to remove it from your history. 
✓ Clearer Setting Description: Updated the description for the "Organize Files into Sections" preference for better clarity.
